title: So Is Hideo Kojima's Next Game 'Abandoned?' - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.18.21
description:
Greg and Bless run through the new revelations that we might be playing into Hideo Kojima's latest ruse with Abandonded.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:18:00 - Housekeeping
Xcast is recording today with Aaron and Pete! patreon.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:19:02 - God dang it: is Abandoned a Kojima Game?
00:40:10 - Ad
00:41:50 - Epic Game Store Leaks?
00:43:56 - Lost Judgment Has a Playable SEGA Master System, Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:48:00 - Out today
00:51:00 - You‘re Wrong
